author: ruffiana
description: Translate messages with Google Translate. Supports user language preferences, caching, and context menu translations.
install_msg:
üåç **Translation Cog** installed successfully!

Quick start:
1. Load the cog: `[p]load translate`
2. Set your preferred language: `[p]setmylanguage <language>`
3. Translate text: `[p]translate to <language> <text>`
4. Use slash commands: `/translate` or right-click messages for quick translate

For help: `[p]help translate`
short: Translate messages using Google Translate with caching and user preferences.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores the preferred language of a user if they choose one.
